channel.title: DeXPeriX Home Page : Articles > Linux > The Linux operation system
channel.description: After long using window$ quite difficult to work with Linux. Articles of this section are designed to make life easier for people, the rolling of window$ in Linux, as well as help some of inveterate linuxoid's. Also, I want to say that this section is "live" - that is, Articles will try to maintain the maximum date and continuously updated.
